DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect food smoking healthy old subject take pomalidomide .
DOC.brief_title: Food Effect CYP1A2 Induction Study Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct two part . Parts 1 2 may conduct parallel subject allow participate one part . In Part 1 , subject randomly assign receive single oral dose 4 mg pomalidomide Day 1 fed ( standard high fat breakfast ) fast condition . After washout period least 3 7 day , subject receive single oral dose 4 mg pomalidomide opposite condition receive first period . In Part 2 , healthy male smoker subject must smoke approximately 20 cigarette per day total 10 day . Non-smokers neither smoke presence smoker . All subject receive orally 200-mg caffeine capsule Day 6 , Day 8 , subject receive single oral dose 4 mg pomalidomide . For Parts 1 2 , serial blood sample collect determination plasma pomalidomide concentration .
DOC.criteria: Part 1 : 1.Must understand voluntarily sign write Informed Consent prior studyrelated procedure perform . 2.Must able communicate Investigator , understand comply requirement study , agree adhere restriction examination schedule . 3.Must male postmenopausal* woman race ≥61 ≤85 year age ( inclusive ) time sign Informed Consent , good health determine physical exam , clinical laboratory safety test result , vital sign , 12 lead Electrocardiogram . * =Naturally postmenopausal least 24 consecutive month ( ie , menses time precede 24 consecutive month ) 4.Subjects must non smoker . 5.Clinical laboratory test must within normal limit acceptable Principal Investigator ( PI ) . 6.Must normal clinically acceptable 12lead Electrocardiogram . 7.Must afebrile ( febrile define ≥ 38.0ºC 100.4 Fahrenheit ) , supine systolic blood pressure ( BP ) : 90 150 mmHg , supine diastolic blood pressure : 60 95 mmHg , pulse rate : 40 110 bpm control medication indicate ( especially blood pressure ) . 1 . If subject diagnosis hypertension , range BP pulse rate one consider well control medication . 8.Must practice true abstinence* agree use condom sexual contact pregnant female female get pregnant participating study , dose interruption least 28 day follow study drug discontinuation , even undergone successful vasectomy . * = True abstinence acceptable line prefer usual lifestyle subject . Period abstinence ( e.g. , calendar , ovulation , symptothermal , post ovulation method ) withdrawal acceptable method contraception 9.Must agree refrain donate sperm semen participate study least 28 day follow last dose study drug . 10.Must agree refrain donate blood plasma ( study ) participate study least 28 day follow last dose study drug . 11.Must agree comply condition describe counsel document ( part pomalidomide Pregnancy Prevention Risk Management Plan .
